summary: At an all-girls boarding school, Manuela falls in love with a teacher, to terrific consequences.
cast: Emilia Unda|Dorothea Wieck|Hedy Krilla|Hertha Thiele|Ellen Schwanneke|Lene Berdolt|Erika Biebrach|Margory Bodker|Gertrud de Lalsky|Else Ehser|Marte Hein|Miriam Lehmann-Haupt|Erika Mann|Barbara Pirk|Ethel Reschke|Lisi Scheerbach|Doris Thalmer|Ilse Vigdor|Annemarie von Rochhausen|Ilse Winter|Charlotte Witthauer
title: Muchachas de uniforme
